chokepoints.name: Strait of Hormuz
chokepoints.note: Iranian naval posturing — IRGCN fast boats active

chokepoints.name: Bab el-Mandeb
chokepoints.note: Houthi anti-ship missile/drone threat — coalition patrols active

chokepoints.name: Taiwan Strait
chokepoints.note: PLA Navy exercises — US transits ongoing

chokepoints.name: Suez Canal
chokepoints.note: Operating normally — traffic diversions from Red Sea

chokepoints.name: GIUK Gap
chokepoints.note: Russian submarine transit monitoring — P-8 patrols

conflicts.name: Ukraine-Russia War
conflicts.summary: Full-scale conventional war. Active frontline ~1,200km. Russian occupation of Crimea, parts of Donetsk, Luhansk, Zaporizhzhia, Kherson. Drone warfare, artillery, trench combat.

conflicts.name: Gaza Conflict
conflicts.summary: Intensive urban warfare following Oct 7 attack. IDF ground operations across Gaza. Massive humanitarian crisis. Regional escalation risk.

conflicts.name: Red Sea / Houthi Campaign
conflicts.summary: Houthi anti-ship missile and drone attacks on Red Sea/Gulf of Aden commercial shipping. US/UK strikes on Houthi positions in Yemen. Major disruption to Suez Canal trade.

conflicts.name: Israel-Hezbollah Border
conflicts.summary: Cross-border exchanges of fire. Israeli strikes on Hezbollah positions in Lebanon. Tens of thousands evacuated on both sides. Risk of full-scale war.

conflicts.name: Syria Civil War (Frozen)
conflicts.parties: Multiple factions — Assad gov, SDF/Kurds, HTS, Turkish-backed forces
conflicts.summary: Largely frozen conflict. US forces at al-Tanf & NE Syria with SDF. Turkish operations against Kurdish forces. Israeli strikes on Iranian assets. Russian air base at Khmeimim.

conflicts.name: Taiwan Strait Tensions
conflicts.summary: Increased PLA military pressure. Regular PLAAF incursions into Taiwan ADIZ. PLA Navy exercises near Taiwan. US arms sales and naval transits continue.

conflicts.name: South China Sea Disputes
conflicts.summary: Chinese maritime militia, coast guard harassment at Second Thomas Shoal. Philippine resupply missions contested. US freedom of navigation operations.

conflicts.name: Iran-Israel Shadow War
conflicts.summary: Covert and overt strikes. Israeli attacks on Iranian nuclear/military facilities. Iranian proxy network (Hezbollah, Iraqi militias, Houthis). Direct missile exchanges in Apr 2024.

exercises.name: DEFENDER EUROPE 2026
exercises.summary: Large-scale NATO deterrence exercise in Eastern Europe. Tests rapid deployment of US forces to European theater. Focus on Baltic and Polish corridors.

exercises.name: RIMPAC 2026
exercises.summary: World's largest international maritime exercise. Held biennially near Hawaii. Anti-submarine warfare, amphibious ops, live-fire exercises, HADR.

exercises.name: STEADFAST DEFENDER
exercises.summary: NATO's largest exercise since Cold War. Tests new defense plans against near-peer threat. Full-spectrum operations from Arctic to Mediterranean.

exercises.name: COBRA GOLD
exercises.summary: Oldest and largest multinational exercise in Asia-Pacific. Hosted by Thailand. Focus on interoperability, humanitarian assistance, and jungle warfare.

exercises.name: KEEN SWORD
exercises.summary: Bilateral US-Japan exercise. Tests defense of Japanese home islands and surrounding seas. Integrates JSDF and USFJ forces.

exercises.name: VOSTOK (Russia)
exercises.summary: Russia's large-scale strategic exercise in Eastern Military District. Scaled down since Ukraine invasion. Tests Pacific Fleet and Eastern theater readiness.

exercises.name: JOINT SWORD (China)
exercises.summary: PLA exercises encircling Taiwan. Simulates blockade and invasion scenarios. Live-fire drills, missile launches into surrounding waters. Escalatory signaling.

exercises.name: RED FLAG
exercises.summary: Premier USAF air combat training exercise. Realistic adversary air ("Red Air") scenarios. Tests 5th-gen integration, electronic warfare, SEAD/DEAD.

gps_zones.name: Kaliningrad Jammer
gps_zones.desc: Persistent GPS jamming emanating from Russian Kaliningrad exclave. Affects Baltic states, Poland, Finland, Sweden.

gps_zones.name: St. Petersburg / NW Russia
gps_zones.desc: Major jamming complex protecting St. Petersburg metro area and military installations.

gps_zones.name: Moscow Kremlin GPS Spoofing
gps_zones.desc: GPS spoofing around Kremlin area. Devices show false position (typically Vnukovo airport).

gps_zones.name: Eastern Mediterranean
gps_zones.desc: Massive GPS spoofing from Russian Khmeimim air base in Syria. Affects Cyprus, Lebanon, Turkey.

gps_zones.name: Ukraine War Zone
gps_zones.desc: Extensive GPS/GNSS jamming and spoofing across entire Ukrainian front. Both sides deploy EW.

gps_zones.name: Northern Black Sea
gps_zones.desc: GPS spoofing over northern Black Sea and Crimea. Ships report false AIS positions.

gps_zones.name: Iran Border Regions
gps_zones.desc: Iranian GPS spoofing capability. Active near nuclear facilities and military installations.

gps_zones.name: Strait of Hormuz
gps_zones.desc: Intermittent GPS interference in Strait of Hormuz. IRGC capability to spoof ship AIS and GPS.

gps_zones.name: Northern Israel / Lebanon
gps_zones.desc: Israeli GPS spoofing along northern border. Defensive measure against Hezbollah GPS-guided rockets.

gps_zones.name: South China Sea
gps_zones.desc: Reports of GPS manipulation near Chinese-occupied features in Spratly/Paracel Islands.

gps_zones.name: North Korea
gps_zones.desc: North Korean GPS jammers along DMZ. Periodically activated to disrupt South Korean navigation.

notams.name: Ukraine Conflict Zone TFR
notams.desc: Total airspace closure over Ukraine and surrounding areas. All civil overflights banned.

notams.name: Eastern Med TFR — Gaza
notams.desc: Airspace restrictions over Gaza and southern Israel. Active military operations.

notams.name: Red Sea Danger Area
notams.desc: Danger area over southern Red Sea and Gulf of Aden. Active Houthi threat.

notams.name: Nevada Test & Training Range
notams.desc: Largest military airspace. Home to Nellis AFB, Area 51, Tonopah Test Range.

notams.name: White Sands Missile Range
notams.desc: Primary US missile testing facility. Hypersonic weapons, air defense, directed energy.

notams.name: Aegean Sea — Turkish/Greek Exercises
notams.desc: Frequent Turkish and Greek military exercise NOTAMs in the Aegean.

notams.name: Persian Gulf Naval Exercise Area
notams.desc: Iranian and US/coalition naval exercise areas.

notams.name: South China Sea ADIZ/TFR
notams.desc: Chinese military NOTAMs for live-fire exercises, missile launches, and naval drills.

notams.name: Barents Sea — Russian Missile Tests
notams.desc: Russian NOTAM area for ICBM/SLBM tests and Northern Fleet exercises.

notams.name: Korean Peninsula ADIZ Overlap
notams.desc: Overlapping KADIZ/JADIZ/Chinese ADIZ. North Korean missile test NOTAMs.
